Option: filesystem.invalid_extension_msg

This options gives you the ability to change the error message that is displayed to the user if the extension of the file is invalid.

This can be very useful if the user needs to understand what the valid extensions are.

Example of usage in the config.php file:

$mcFileManagerConfig['filesystem.invalid_extension_msg'] = "Error: The extension of the file is invalid.";

Example of usage in a mc_access file:

filesystem.invalid_extension_msg=Error: The name of the extension is invalid.
